values:
I wish my American friends all the best for the upcoming elections.
No matter who will win i hope he will take good care of the country and the people.

I am proud to announce that the Blackpaw Online Shop offers all new Sofawolf Press Products again.
After Eurofurence it took me a few weeks to place a new order and put all the products online, so thanks a lot for your patience.
And thanks to Tani for helping me again  :)

If you are living in Europe or eastern Europe feel free to visit our online shop:




If you order from the United States you better visit the Sofawolf Press site:

www.sofawolf.com

Thank you everybody for making this Con what it is!
See you next year.

Three minutes to go and another weekend is over.

We finished all props for the pawpet show, luckily the weather was on our side this time, no flooding.
I feel very exhausted but in a good way.
Next weekend will be the last pawpet rehersal before EF and the boss of our stage and light rental company will stop by at my place for discussing the last details.

Besides this i only have a few things left on my EF to do list.
I have to take my Jeep to the techincal inspection service and i have to get all the stuff for the Blackpaw Shop ready.

Ah yes and i will turn 30 next Friday, i guess i will have the party after EF  :P

Spend the day in the garage again with my dad............(Thanks to Goldie for helping)


I tryed to start the engine but one gas hose is broken, besides this everything seems to work fine.
I will get the last parts i need in saturday.


Hes got eyes again and seems to be quite happy  :)


Installed the door locks on all four dors.


This part looks almost finished  ;)


All door gaskets are new too


Shiny......

I need a new  IBM/Lenovo Thinkpad.

Are there ans good US websites or stores where i can buy them?

I'm going to buy it when i'm in the us for Anthrocon.

Yesterday, Kralle and Bigbluefox helped me in the garage.
We mounted the front and rear bumper wich was a lot of work.......but at the end they fit perfectly.

Kralle took care of the seats and Bigbluefox installed the rear lamps, thank you guys its much more fun to work together :)


After lots of cursing and taking care of the paint the front bumper is finally installed.


You have to be very careful......the paint is more importand than your fiungers  ;)


Kralle taking care of the seats.


Door covering before.....and after.....


No comment........


Sexy Back :)


Rear bumper and lamp holders installed.


Vintage ADAC sticker for the windshield  :)   Same as AAA in the us

When i was cleaning the foxden i found a box with old fotos.
From a holidy 9 years ago..........
Its interesting to lookt at those after such a long time.

I started a therapy today against my allergy, at the begining i have to go every week to the doc to get my shot.
Laterit will be only every five weeky, the complete program will take three years.

Mainly its against my hay fever but i do a complete program against everything i'm allergic to like nuts,horses, cats and some rodents.

I really dohope that it helps since the hay fever really sucks at work.
After the people in paris managed to put out the olympic fire three times today it seems that san francisco is preparing itself too  ;)

Flights are booked  :)



Who else will be there?

Today i went with my dad to a car exhibition in my hometown.

Mainly we were searching for missing parts for the ponton.
We fond almost everything, lots of rubber parts and engine stuff. Also a few books and original a mercedes engine documentation.
I ordered a few chrome parts and tools and i also found a very nice original radio system......fully restored  *drool*




Fully restored Ponton, this is what mine will look like.........in black.


Daddy looking at a 170v


A beautiful 19e EVO


300 Adenauer


My personal dream car 300SL (Condition: better than new.  Price: 1.1 millon)


A nice S class, this one is the smaller brother of my 6.9


Citroen with Maseratti engine (V6Biturbo)


The stand of the Mercedes club, with free beer and food for members.......yay for membership  :P
We met some people which we have not seen in years....was pretty nice.


This baby need some work.....my dad had to pull me away  ;)


The legendary 600, i remember this one very well...........................


Nice caddy


A 350S cabrio............very hard to find

I'm feeling way better today, finally.
But it seems that it was really a good idea to stay at home until the flu is completly gone..........thanks again to rapante.

Anthrocon:

I'm going to by the tickets for this years Anthrocon within the next days..........its amazing the prices fora flight to new york in the summertime are as high as a flight to san francisco in january.............unless i fly with Alitalia via Milano........no way  :P
But anyway, we will fly in to new york and drive to anthrocon and back with a rental car.
This week jaryic got thr flu, then hurga then tani and now it got me...........

Just a short update:

Front and rear window are finally installed.
And a few body gaskets which are very very tricky and a pain in the ass to install :P


Front window


Rear window


Bloody gasket

Finally 4 free days  *wags*

I will just use them to relax a litte  :)

I changed my internet and phone provider and they will activate it next tuesday......
Well i hope this will work  :P

Create Fake Magazine Covers with your own picture at MagMyPic.com
Discount Magazine Subscriptions - Save big!

Every few weeks i get a delivery from my company with the stuff i sell.
Normally this is not a problem but the delivery company get new drivers all the time and things like this happen:

I always call the company one day before they deliver the stuff and tell them to please call me ten minutes before the driver arrives so i can come down to my storage. (In my area traffic jams are common so it happens a lot that i have to wait wich is no problem if they tell me)

Well..........................two out of ten manage to call me and everything is fine.
From the remaining eight only 50% manage it to call and it goes like this:

*ring*

Me: Hello?

Driver: HEY, i'm in front of your house, where the hell are you?!

Me: Oh really? I'm in front of my house too, you must have one of those new invisible trucks, can you honk so i can find you?

Driver:  ....................

Me: Hello?

Driver: shit.........i think i mixed up the city, stay where you are, i'll be there in half an hour

Me:  *ggrrrrrrrrrrrr*




Once they arrive in front of my house i tell them: Please drive right around the house, there is a double garage on a parking lot, the right one is my storage.

Here is the interesting thing...................................
In the time i walk around the house the truck disapperars completely!!!

What the hell is so hard about driving around a house?!

I think a double garage must be something completely different in the head of a delivery driver......

Maybe something like this:


Or like this:



Lets see what happens next time.........................

I started to reassemble the Ponton today.

Thanks to Kralle and my Dad for helping  :)

What we did today:
- cleaned the seats and the rear bench
- finished the dashboard
- installed the trunk handle
- polished the bumpers and the grille
- installed the radiator, the cooling fan and most of the cooling system
- installed a battery


Stuff you need.................


Anti drone sheet installed in the trunk


Dashboard before.......


And after  :)


More detail


Engine before......


And after....



The seats...........

Today:  Working on the Ponton  :)

Pics later....................

Hi everyone!

Now is your chance to get off the waiting list. Today we have finally been able to complete our negotiations with the Golden Tulip Hotel in Suhl, and I think we've been able to come up with a very acceptable solution. We now have an extra 120 rooms available. The hotel is located in the city center of Suhl, which is less than a 10 minute drive. To make the extra distance bearable we will be offering a FREE 24h shuttle service between the two hotels. So even if you decide to check in at the overflow hotel, you will be able to get up and down the hill without an own car, rental or taxi.

For details about the hotel, booking and tariff, please check out the new overflow hotel section of the EF webpage:

http://www.eurofurence.org/EF14/cont-overflow.html

The Ponton is safe down in the workshop waiting to be reassabled.
I am so going to hurry up.............testdrive!

Jaryic and Tani are working heavily on the new blackpaw shop, i help whereever i can.
The system seems to run fine and the layout looks very good. As soon i get the new products the shop will be online!

The weather got a lot better over here and i hope the sun will stay over the weekend.

Plans for this weekend:

Getting the Ponton from the garage down to the workshop without any damage.

Working on the blackpaw online shop. I really want it back online soon.

Spending the nights with friends watching dvds and trying some recipes from my new cookbook.

I'm at home......finally.
And......TADA.......this is the first time my luggage arrived too  :)
I will now unpack my luggage and give Bentley a good brush.
After that i'll pack again cause i have to leave in 9 hours to my business trip............................
I'm so wasted, i hope a shower and some sleep will helb.
I'll be back at wednesday afternoon.

Ok, right now i'm packing my stuff cause i have to leave in 4 hours.

I woke up this morning with a aching thorat and the feeling that i have cought a flu.......... i really hope that the long flight back is not going to make it worse.

Have fun everybody and seeyou at AC or EF.

I'm at further confusion now *wags*

I will not make many postings since i have to leave on saturday and i want to enjoy as much time down in the hotel as i can.
Its nice to be here again meeting all the people  :)

Ah yes............

Damn you Wolfgang Puck!

........thats all

We habe been in 3 US States so far.
We went to big electronic stores we went to game stores..................................nothing!

Its sold out everywhere  *sigh*

If anyone of you knows where to get them that would be great.
Or if anyone can bring them to Further Confusion that would be great too.  (of course we would pay cash)

What we need:

Black / Red : BigBlueFox
Black / Red: Nightfox
Black / Red: Jaryic

Black:  TaniDaReal

Its 4 am.......our flight leaves in 8 hours...............
I'll try to get some sleep now.............


California here i come.

This year it was impossible for me to find the time for sending some real christmas cards, so i think this is better than nothing. :)

I wish all my friends merry christmas and a happy new year.

I'm looking forward to see most of you at the new years party or at Further Confusion.

I have my winter holydays now  *yay* no more work till january 7 *wags*

I went for a little christmas shopping wich was more stressful than work :P  after that i bought a  christmas tree for my parents together with my mom, that was a little more relaxing.

The only thing i have to do till christmas is to clean up my den a little but that is fine.......

I got the Ponton back last friday.
Now the interior roof is done *wags*

Next step is the front and rear window, after that i'll bring the engine back to running.



The ponton is back home.......the w116 watches after him  ;)



The new roof, i think they did a really good job.



The roof again from the back.



The new paint  turned out really great..........its still very dusty.



And the back..........

I'll look for presents on friday and saturday............................
This year my parents will not really celebrate christmas since my grandma died a few weeks ago and my mother is still very sad.
Normaly the complete family meets at my parents house for christmas wich is allways a lot of fun.
But we will take a break this year.

I will celebrate christmas just with my parents and a few friends of mine and on the second holiday we have a furry chistmas with all the local furs anyway.

I reserved a table in a near by restaurant and invited my parents on the first holiday for dinner, i think they will like that and not everything will remind my mom of my grandma.

This is my this years christmas tree  :)
Thanks a lot to
tanidareal
 for helping me decorating it  *wags*





*nosebeeeeeep*



He climbed 1 hour to reach the top, now he does not know the way down.........

Ok, maybe a little late :P

My jeep is running again, and to my surprise it drives straight forward.........it has never done that before :P


It took me 4 hours in total i think.


This is what it looked like before...............



Now it looks like this..................



And like that...........



This is the broken part...............the rubber part has a really tiny hole. the problem is that greese comes out.........direct to my brake disc  ;)

The weather is ok today so i will try to repair the stering system of my jeep today.

If i don't post a comment tonight, i failed  ;)
Here you can find all the fursuit photos from the photoshoot in paris: http://www.eurofurence.org/tracks/

Comment of the day from Tani: "I'll take the little trashcan out of the bathroom so i have more space for taking a shower"

French lesson one: Don't mix up "merde" and "merci"

French lesson two: "Un baguette por favor" brings you no baguette but a confused salesmen.

French lesson three: Who knows how to tell the roommate if she please can stay out because i'm still in my bed?

I arrived in paris yesterday night at 2:00 pm together with BigBlueFox, TaniDaReal, Cheeath, o'wolf and Tioh.
We are representing Eurofurence at the arte tracks festival (arte is a frensh tv station.

You can find more details and fotos in BigblueFox lifeyournal  :)

I just want to mention our hotelroom wich is so small that you have to leave the room to change your mind as someone mentioned  ;)

But its still very nice, its clean and in a very nice part of the city, its all very artistic and free i really like it  :)

The first day was a great success but i'm totally exhausted now, luckily we can sleep till 12:00 tomorrow.

Last weekend Thalian and Susanne came to my place for a private Fursuit Photoshoot.
Thalian is the official Eurofurence photographer and some of you might know him already.

It was so great, they did a wonderful job and took photos of Bentley, BigBlueFox, Savoy, Tani and Taibu.
They also brought some really nice props *wags*

I'll try to post some results as soon as possible.

And thanks again you two for the great weekend  :)

My dear grandmother passed away this morning in her sleep, surrounded by her children and grandchildren.

She was like a second mother to me cause i spend a huge part of my childhood at her place when my parents were traveling.
I will remember her as the most lovely and caring person i ever know, she never got mad at me she never lost her patience.

Thank you for everything, i will never forget you.
The paint is finally done! *wags* Now it gets a new roof interior after that i'll get it back.
